casebody.data:
Raymond A. DA SILVA, Executor of the Estate of Dolores J. Pierce, Plaintiff,
v.
WAKEMED, WakemMed d/b/a WakemMed Cary Hospital, and WakeMed Faculty Practice Plan, Defendants. No. COA17-820 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: April 17, 2018

REVERSED IN PART. VACATED. REMANDED IN PART.
